info.title: Augment API
info.description: JIRA automation platform for generating ticket descriptions, creating tasks, and managing workflows.

get.description: Basic health check endpoint - publicly accessible
Comprehensive health check for all services - publicly accessible
List supported LLM providers and their available models

post.description: Generate a password hash for authentication setup. Use the generated hash in AUTH_PASSWORD_HASH environment variable.

post.summary: Generate description for a single ticket
post.description: Generate a description for a single JIRA ticket. Use async_mode=true to process in the background.
Process multiple tickets using a JQL query. Preview mode by default. Set update_jira=true to apply changes.

get.description: Get the status and results of a background job. Works with batch, single, story_coverage, story_generation, task_generation, test_generation, and prd_story_sync jobs.

delete.description: Cancel a running or queued job. Only jobs with status 'started' or 'processing' can be cancelled.

get.description: List all background jobs with their status. Filter by status or job_type.

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter by job status (started, processing, completed, failed, cancelled)
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter by job status (started, processing, completed, failed, cancelled)

parameters.name: job_type

schema.description: Filter by job type (batch, single, story_coverage, story_generation, task_generation, test_generation, prd_story_sync)
schema.title: Job Type

parameters.description: Filter by job type (batch, single, story_coverage, story_generation, task_generation, test_generation, prd_story_sync)

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of jobs to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of jobs to return

get.summary: Get job status by ticket key
get.description: Get job status for a ticket. Returns the active job if processing, otherwise the latest completed job.

get.summary: Analyze epic structure and identify gaps
get.description: Analyze an epic to find missing stories, incomplete stories, and orphaned tasks. Returns gap analysis with recommendations.

post.description: Complete planning workflow: gap analysis, story generation, task breakdown, cycle time validation, and test case generation. Preview mode by default.
Generate missing stories from PRD/RFC requirements with acceptance criteria and test cases. Preview mode by default. Set dry_run=false to create tickets.

schema.title: Response Generate Stories For Epic Plan Stories Generate Post

post.description: Generate tasks for stories with breakdown and custom LLM configuration. Preview mode by default. Set dry_run=false to create tickets.

schema.title: Response Generate Tasks For Stories Plan Tasks Generate Post

get.summary: Get cycle time estimate for a ticket
get.description: Get cycle time estimate including development, testing, review, and deployment time. Includes confidence level and split recommendations for oversized tasks.

post.description: Generate tasks separated by team (Backend, Frontend, QA) with dependencies and cycle time optimization. Preview mode by default. Set dry_run=false to create tickets.

post.summary: Sync story tickets from PRD table to JIRA
post.description: Sync story tickets from PRD table to JIRA. Supports both synchronous and asynchronous processing.

schema.title: Response Sync Stories From Prd Plan Stories Sync From Prd Post

post.description: Execute complete planning workflow and optionally create JIRA tickets. Preview mode by default. Includes validation and error recovery. Supports async_mode for background processing.

schema.title: Response Execute Planning With Creation Plan Epic Create Post

post.summary: Generate and create stories for epic
post.description: Generate and optionally create story tickets for an epic with acceptance criteria. Preview mode by default. Supports async_mode for background processing.

schema.title: Response Create Stories For Epic Plan Stories Create Post

post.summary: Generate and create tasks for stories
post.description: Generate and optionally create task tickets for stories with cycle time estimates. Validates cycle time constraints. Preview mode by default. Supports async_mode for background processing.

schema.title: Response Create Tasks For Stories Plan Tasks Create Post

get.description: Validate epic structure: check story-epic links, task-story relationships, and relationship consistency.

schema.title: Response Validate Epic Structure Plan Validate  Epic Key  Get

post.summary: Generate comprehensive test suite for an epic
post.description: Generate complete test suites for all stories and tasks in an epic. Coverage levels: minimal, basic, standard (default), comprehensive.

post.summary: Generate test cases for a story
post.description: Generate targeted test cases for a story including acceptance, integration, E2E, performance, and security tests. Coverage levels: minimal, basic, standard (default), comprehensive.

post.summary: Generate test cases for a task
post.description: Generate test cases for a technical task including unit, integration, performance, and security tests. Coverage levels: minimal, basic, standard (default), comprehensive.

post.summary: Generate context-aware test cases for a task
post.description: Generate test cases for a task using context from parent story, PRD/RFC documents, and task details. Coverage levels: minimal, basic, standard (default), comprehensive.

post.summary: Analyze story requirements coverage by tasks
post.description: Check if existing tasks cover all story requirements. Returns coverage percentage and suggestions for updating or creating tasks. Read-only - no JIRA changes. Use async_mode=true for background processing.

schema.title: Response Analyze Story Coverage Analyze Story Coverage Post

post.summary: Update existing task with improved description and test cases
post.description: Update a task with improved description and test cases from coverage analysis. Preview mode by default. Set update_jira=true to apply changes.

post.summary: Create new task from coverage analysis suggestions
post.description: Create a new task to fill coverage gaps. Typically used with suggestions from coverage analysis. Preview mode by default. Set create_ticket=true to create in JIRA. Automatically links to parent story.

post.summary: Update JIRA ticket with partial updates and link management
post.description: Update a JIRA ticket with partial updates: summary, description, test cases, and issue links. Preview mode by default. Set update_jira=true to apply changes.

post.summary: Create a new JIRA Task ticket
post.description: Create a new JIRA Task ticket. Automatically links to parent epic and story. Supports test cases and blocking relationships. Preview mode by default. Set create_ticket=true to create.

post.summary: Create a new JIRA Story ticket
post.description: Create a new JIRA Story ticket. Automatically links to parent epic. Supports test cases. Mandays are calculated from child tasks if provided. Preview mode by default. Set create_ticket=true to create.

Update an existing story ticket. Only works on Story tickets - will return an error if you try to update a different ticket type. You can update the title, description, test cases, parent epic, or add links. By default, this shows you what would change without actually updating anything. Set update_jira=true when you're ready to make the changes.
Update multiple story tickets in a single request. Each story can have different update values. Supports preview mode and async processing.

schema.title: Response Bulk Update Stories Jira Bulk Update Stories Post

post.description: Create multiple task tickets in a single request. All tickets are created first, then all links are created. Preview mode by default. Set create_tickets=true to create. Supports async_mode for background processing.

schema.title: Response Bulk Create Tasks Jira Bulk Create Tasks Post

post.description: Create multiple story tickets in a single request. All tickets are created first, then all links are created. Preview mode by default. Set create_tickets=true to create.

post.summary: Resubmit prompt with modifications for A/B testing
post.description:
Resubmit a modified prompt to compare results with the original generation.
         Use after calling any generation endpoint to test prompt modifications.
         
         **Supported Operations:**
         - `generate_single`: Generate single ticket description
         - `plan_tasks`: Generate tasks for stories (simplified for A/B testing)
         - `analyze_coverage`: Analyze story coverage by tasks
         
         **Use Cases:**
         - Test different prompt phrasings
         - Compare system prompt variations
         - Evaluate different LLM models
         - Fine-tune generation quality
         
         **Note:** Original result must be provided for comparison.

get.description: Get all sprints for a JIRA board, optionally filtered by state

schema.title: Response List Board Sprints Sprint Board  Board Id  Sprints Get

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific sprint

post.description: Create a new sprint on a board
Assign one or more tickets to a sprint. Preview mode by default.
Remove tickets from their current sprint (move to backlog)

get.description: Get all issues currently in a sprint

post.description: Plan epic tasks across sprints based on capacity and dependencies. Preview mode by default. Use async_mode=true for background processing.

schema.title: Response Plan Epic To Sprints Sprint Plan Epic Post

post.description: Create a timeline view showing when tasks will be completed across sprints. Preview mode by default. Use async_mode=true for background processing.

schema.title: Response Create Timeline Sprint Timeline Post

get.description: Get existing timeline for an epic
Get list of team members, optionally filtered by team or level

schema.title: Response List Team Members Team Members Get

post.description: Create a new team member and assign to teams

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific team member

delete.description: Soft delete a team member (sets is_active=false)

get.description: Get list of all team roles (teams)

get.summary: Get list of all career levels
get.description: Get list of all career levels
Get total capacity for a role (team)

TeamMemberRequest.description: Request model for creating/updating team member

TeamMemberResponse.title: TeamMemberResponse
TeamMemberResponse.description: Response model for team member details

traceability.title: Traceability
traceability.description: Requirement or story ID this test validates

precondition.title: Precondition
precondition.description: System state required before test execution

test_steps.title: Test Steps
test_steps.description: Detailed test steps in Gherkin format

source.title: Source
source.description: Source of test generation: llm_ai, llm_fallback, pattern, fallback

epic_key.title: Epic Key
epic_key.description: Epic key for comprehensive test generation

story_key.title: Story Key
story_key.description: Story key for story-specific test generation

task_key.title: Task Key
task_key.description: Task key for task-specific test generation

coverage_level.title: Coverage Level
coverage_level.description: Test coverage level: minimal, basic, standard, comprehensive

async_mode.title: Async Mode
async_mode.description: Process in background (returns job_id for status tracking)

include_documents.title: Include Documents
include_documents.description: Include PRD/RFC document context in test generation

llm_provider.title: Llm Provider
llm_provider.description: LLM provider: openai, claude, gemini, or kimi (uses default if not specified)

llm_model.title: Llm Model
llm_model.description: LLM model to use (uses default for provider if not specified)

TestGenerationRequest.title: TestGenerationRequest
TestGenerationRequest.description: Request model for test case generation operations

test_count.title: Test Count
test_count.description: Total number of test cases generated

TestGenerationResponse.title: TestGenerationResponse
TestGenerationResponse.description: Response model for test generation operations

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Start date for timeline (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD)

team_capacity_days.title: Team Capacity Days
team_capacity_days.description: Team capacity in days (if not provided, uses team member data)

async_mode.title: Async Mode
async_mode.description: Process in background (returns job_id for status tracking)

TimelineResponse.title: TimelineResponse
TimelineResponse.description: Timeline with scheduled sprints and dates

story_key.title: Story Key
story_key.description: The story ticket key you want to update

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Update the story title. Leave empty to keep current title.

description.title: Description
description.description: Update the story description. Leave empty to keep current description.

test_cases.title: Test Cases
test_cases.description: Update test cases for this story. Leave empty to keep current test cases.

parent_key.title: Parent Key
parent_key.description: Change the parent epic. Leave empty to keep current parent.

links.title: Links
links.description: Create links to other tickets. Leave empty if you don't need to add links.

update_jira.title: Update Jira
update_jira.description: Set to true to actually update the ticket. Default is false (preview mode).

UpdateStoryTicketRequest.title: UpdateStoryTicketRequest
UpdateStoryTicketRequest.description: Request to update a JIRA Story ticket

updated_description.title: Updated Description
updated_description.description: Updated task description (user can copy from suggestions and edit)

UpdateTaskRequest.title: UpdateTaskRequest
UpdateTaskRequest.description: Request to update an existing task with suggested improvements

preview_description.title: Preview Description
preview_description.description: Preview of description (if not updated in JIRA)

preview_test_cases.title: Preview Test Cases
preview_test_cases.description: Preview of test cases (if not updated in JIRA)

UpdateTaskSuggestion.title: UpdateTaskSuggestion
UpdateTaskSuggestion.description: Suggestion for updating an existing task

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: New ticket summary/title (optional, only updated if provided)

description.title: Description
description.description: New ticket description (optional, only updated if provided)

test_cases.title: Test Cases
test_cases.description: Test cases content for custom field (optional, only updated if provided)

mandays.title: Mandays
mandays.description: Mandays estimation value (optional, only updated if provided)

links.title: Links
links.description: List of issue links to create (optional)

update_jira.title: Update Jira
update_jira.description: Update JIRA (default: false for preview mode)

UpdateTicketRequest.title: UpdateTicketRequest
UpdateTicketRequest.description: Request to update a JIRA ticket with partial updates support

updates_applied.title: Updates Applied
updates_applied.description: Dictionary of field names and whether they were successfully updated

links_created.title: Links Created
links_created.description: List of links that were created with details

UpdateTicketResponse.title: UpdateTicketResponse
UpdateTicketResponse.description: Response from updating a JIRA ticket

HTTPBasic.description: HTTP Basic Authentication. Required when AUTH_ENABLED=true (except for health check endpoints).
